item.description: Source: Gravity 2013 Hello! Welcome to my blog. I am Kazi Hossain, currently an undergraduate student studying Computer Science & Mathematics. If you can’t tell already, I am obsessed with space. Within the pages of this blog, I share my musings on a diverse range of topics, including but not limited to technology, aerospace, physics, engineering, school, mathematics, and more. Additionally, I occasionally delve into literature and lifestyle. Thanks for stopping by!

📗 Finished Reading ⏳ Currently Reading 📕 Added to reading List Currently Reading (as of Sat, June 08) ⏳ Mastery All Readings 📕 Atomic Habbit 📕 Almanack of Naval Ravikant 📕 Crime and Punishment 📕 Fathers and Sons 📕 Jane Austen 📕 The picture of Dorian Gray 📕 The Art of War 📕 Deep Work 📕 The Prince 📕 The Stranger 📕 Beyond Good Evil 📕 The Brothers Karamazov 📕 Letters From A Stoic 📕 The Incoherence of the Philosophers 📕 Discourses and Selected Writings 📕 Meditataion 📕 Bunny 📕 How to Teach Quantum Physics To Your Dog 📕 Ikigai 📕 If We Were Villains 📕 No Longer Human 📕 My Life For Lebanon 📕 The Political Science of The Middle East 📕 The Arabian Nights Tales Of 101 Nights 📕 Frankenstein 📕 Vicious 📕 The Waves 📕 The Metamorphosis and Other Stories 📕 The Alchemy of Happiness 📕 How Judges Think 📕 Feynman Lectures On Gravitation 📕 1984 📕 Hitchhiker’s Guide to the Galaxy 📕 Brave New World 📕 The Stranger 📕 Old Man and The Sea 📕 Notes from Underground 📕 Sapiens 📕 The Book of Five Rings 📕 Man’s Search for Meaning 📕 The Alchemist 📕 On Writing: A Memoir of the Craft 📕 Player of Games 📕 Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?

People Paul Graham Sam Altman Patrick Collison Vitalik Buterin Naval Ravikant Alexey Guzey Marc Andreessen Melting Asphalt Andrej Karpathy Garry Tan Amjad Masad Sharif Shameem Alexandr Wang Stephen Wolfram Eliezer Yudkowsky
